short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Adds movie trailers, library shuffling, and 21:9 zoom support to Plex
short.de: Fügt Plex Filmtrailer, Bibliotheksmischungen und 21: 9-Zoomunterstützung hinzu
short.es: Agrega avances de películas, reproducción aleatoria de bibliotecas y compatibilidad con zoom 21: 9 a Plex
short.fr: Ajoute des bandes-annonces, un tri aléatoire et un zoom 21: 9 à Plex
short.it: Aggiunge trailer di film, riproduzione casuale della libreria e supporto dello zoom 21:9 a Plex
short.ja: 映画の予告編、ライブラリのシャッフル、21：9ズームのサポートをPlexに追加します
short.ko: Plex에 영화 예고편, 라이브러리 셔플 및 21:9 와이드 스크린 지원 추가
short.nl: Voegt filmtrailers, bibliotheek shuffling en 21: 9 zoomondersteuning toe aan Plex
short.pt_BR: Adiciona trailers de filmes, embaralhamento de biblioteca e suporte de zoom 21: 9 ao Plex
short.ru: Добавляет в Plex трейлеры фильмов, перемешивание библиотеки и поддержку масштабирования 21: 9
short.sv: Lägger till filmtrailers, biblioteksblandning och 21: 9-zoomstöd till PLEX
short.zh_CN: 为Plex增加电影预告片，资源整合和宽屏支持。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Enhance-O-Tron adds the following features to Plex*:

Trailers:
- Open a movie library item and a link to the trailer will appear beneath the title

Random library sorting:
- Click the dice icon to shuffle your library view

2.35:1 (aka 21:9 ultrawide) fullscreen zoom:
- Click the 21:9 button in the bottom toolbar to view your widescreen films without black bars on ultrawide displays.

Audio Compressor:
- Click the volume compressor icon in the bottom toolbar to enable dynamic range audio compression. This lowers the volume of loud sounds and amplifies quiet sounds. It's ideal for watching video at low volumes, adding clarity to voices and improving the overall richness of the sound.

Note on Installing:
- Enhance-O-Tron runs automatically on app.plex.tv or localhost. If you run Plex on a custom host or IP, go to your Plex web and just click the Enhance-O-Tron toolbar button to enable it for that URL.

Your library is not modified in any way, the extra functions are simply added to the web interface.

* Plex, the Plex Play logo and Plex Media Server are trademarks of Plex and used under a license.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,ko,nl,pt_BR,ru,sv:
Enhance-O-Tron adds the following features to Plex*:

Trailers:
- Open a movie library item and a link to the trailer will appear beneath the title

Random library sorting:
- Click the dice icon to shuffle your library view

2.35:1 (aka 21:9) fullscreen zoom:
- Click the 21:9 button in the bottom toolbar to view your widescreen films without black bars

Your library is not modified in any way, the plugin just adds the extra functions to the web interface.

Note this extension is designed to only run on app.plex.tv or localhost to avoid requesting broad security permissions. If you are accessing your Plex Media Server through a different URL, let me know on GitHub.

*Plex, the Plex Play logo and Plex Media Server are trademarks of Plex and used under a license.
long.zh_CN:
预告片：
- 打开一个电影库项目，标题下方会出现预告片的链接。

打乱收藏排序 :
-点击骰子图标以更新收藏界面。

超宽(21:9)全屏缩放:
- 点击下方工具栏的21:9按钮，以便享受你的超宽屏电影的 全部影像魅力。

Your library is not modified in any way, the plugin just adds the extra functions to the web interface.

Note this extension is designed to only run on app.plex.tv or localhost to avoid requesting broad security permissions. If you are accessing your Plex Media Server through a different URL, let me know on GitHub.

*Plex, the Plex Play logo and Plex Media Server are trademarks of Plex and used under a license.
